entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is present in the scene. He is mentioned as directing his wand at a twig and saying 'Wingardium Leviosa!' (line 1).

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is present in the scene. She is mentioned as saying 'Perfect!' after Ron casts a spell (line 5).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who is present in the scene. He is mentioned as hesitating and then deciding to kill the snake (lines 13-16).

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a character who is mentioned as wanting Harry to come towards him (line 14). He is also mentioned as being at the end of the tunnel (line 16).

entities.name: willow
entities.description: The Willow is a tree that is present in the scene. It is mentioned as having ominously swaying branches (line 6).

entities.name: snake
entities.description: The snake is an animal that is present in the scene. It is mentioned as being where Voldemort is and needing to be killed (lines 15-16).

relationships.description: Harry is at the end of the tunnel where Voldemort is. This relationship is described in line 16, where it says 'Voldemort was at the end of this tunnel'.
Harry needs to kill the snake. This relationship is described in lines 15-16, where it says 'the only way forward was to kill the snake'.
Ron encourages Harry to go towards Voldemort. This relationship is described in line 17, where it says 'Harry wriggled into the earthy passage hidden in the tree's roots'.
